QuestData.Title: Juice Delivery
QuestData.Description: Here's your Zombie Juice...$B$B...and be careful with this stuff. It's strong enough to raise the dead!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Zombie Juice to Abercrombie at Beggar's Haunt.
QuestData.CompletionText: I need that Zombie Juice to keep me warm on these cold, dark nights. Did you get it for me?
QuestData.RewardText: A thousand thanks, $n. You warm an old man's heart with your foolish-...I mean...with your kindness!$B$BHere you are, friend. Take this as a token of my gratitude.
